::Savanna/Spitfire::


Savanna::
She let go of the bounty hunter and dropped to the ground, landing on 
all fours. She walked over to HotRod. "They aren't going to talk.  I 
think we need someone else to talk to them."

Spitfire::
She walked up to HotRod and Savanna.
"OK, your way hasn't worked." pointing to Savanna.
"My way hasn't worked. And HotRod's approach didn't have any effect.  
I think we should just head to the ship and regroup."

Savanna::
"I got another idea. Why don't we try to head to the Ark and beat 
these guys to the ship?"

Spitfire::
"Because that would mean the Cybertron Fire would be unguarded then."

Savanna:: 
She turned to HotRod, "Whom do you have on the Cybertron Fire now to 
protect it? If there is at least one bot on duty, then we can go to 
the Ark and put up a defence there." 

Spitfire::
"Hmm, I think Savanna has a point.  The bots at the Ark may need help 
with those guys.  What do yo think HotRod?"

Both girls looked at HotRod. After all, he was the commanding officer 
in the group at the moment.
